entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
